rukus.text: Sic DEUS dictus O Jesus ego terminating tuus vita levabat vos to Me ridding vos de disbelievers! Ego exalt those subsequentis vos supra those disbelieve Feria Resurrection. Tunc to Me est ultimate destiny de totus de vos tunc ego scabinus vos tuus disputes
Prout pro those disbelieve ego commit them painful retribution in hoc saeculum in Hereafter They non habet helpers
Prout pro those believe lead righteous vita He fully recompense them! DEUS NON love the unjust
These est revelations ut nos recite vos provisus message foderator de wisdom
example Jesus DEUS de est same prout ut de Adam; He created eum dust tunc dictus to eum Est he est
Hoc est truth tuus Dominus; non harbor any doubts
anyone argues vos knowledge vos received tunc dictus Let nos summon noster infans tuus infans noster femina tuus femina yourselves tunc let nos invoke deus curse liars
Absolutely hoc est narration truth. Absolutely ibi non est deus absque DEUS! Absolutely DEUS est Almighty Wise
they turn tunc DEUS est fully aware de evildoers
